ISSUE.TITLE: Remove font-awesome 6.4 CDN from resources
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Describe the bug font-awesome 6.4 does not have a CDN but one is defined in the resources. Instead, maybe use the local resource using `.SetUrl()` https://www.jsdelivr.com/package/npm/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free When I used font 6.4 in production, I get issue with the integrity token @agriffard

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Add top level Multi Tenancy menu (#12671) Add top level Multi Tenancy menu and Move tenants and Tenant feature profile under Multi Tenancy menu. Fixes #12670
